page.title: 19THE CARAVAN SITE
page.content: ONE MILE SOUTH OF POTTERNE, FOUR HUNDRED YARDS EAST OF THE DEVIZES TO SAILSBURY ROAD IS A SMALL GROUP OF LOCAL AMENITIES. TWELVE ALLOTMENTS A FOOTBALL FIELD WITH CLUBHOUSE AND A ROADSIDE WOODEN SEAT. NEARBY IS A COUNCIL OWNED CARAVAN AND CAMPING SITE. Â£3.50 PER NIGHT IS CHARGED FOR EACH UNIT. A CENTRAL BUILDING HOUSES WARDENS, ACCOMODATION, A SHOP, LAUNDRY AND TOILET FACILITIES AND A TAP OUTSIDE FOR DRINKING WATER. THE SITE IS SURROUNDED BY WELL CLIPPED HEDGES, TREES AND MOWN GRASS. PATRONS COME FOR THE NIGHT ON ROUTE FROM NORTH TO SOUTH OR EAST TO WEST OR TO STAY A WEEK OR MORE TO ENJOY THE PEACE OF THIS RURAL BACKWATER.
